response.original_title: Two or Three Things I Know About Film
response.overview: “Does a camera tell you how to feel?” Eve asks Adam in the back corner of a grubby London café, in just one of the dreamlike spaces crafted in Johnstone’s playful interrogation of our complex relationship with film. A time capsule of London’s 80s neon-clad cinema culture, and a pertinent reminder of the theories underpinning our ways of seeing, 'Two or Three Things' demonstrates an utterly unique approach to how we talk about cinema.
response.title: Two or Three Things I Know About Film
